channel.title: Bootstrapped.fm, episode 89, "It's The Open Desert That Got Me"
channel.description:
[In this episode](http://bootstrapped.fm/89-its-the-open-desert-that-got-me/) we talk about Ian & NPS, Butov’s attempts to hire millennials, and paying people to watch video games.
Thanks to Linode for sponsoring this episode. [Sign up today and get $20 off.](https://linode.com/bootstrappedfm/?utm_source=bootstrapped&utm_medium=podcast&utm_content=20%20dollar&utm_campaign=bootstrapped2016)

item.title: Bootstrapped.fm, episode 89, "It's The Open Desert That Got Me"
item.dc:creator: rfctr
item.description:
Thanks for another good one!

Thermostat is a nice pair product for HelpSpot. But why it isn’t a part of HelpSpot itself? Don’t helpdesk customers need to send such a survey from time to time?

Re: @andrey WFH CTO - this sounds like an impossible combination. Eager to see how that will work out…

Read full topic
item.source: Bootstrapped.fm, episode 89, "It's The Open Desert That Got Me"
